DOC.detailed_description: Depression serious medical illness difficult diagnose treat , especially child adolescent . Signs depression child may include follow behavior : pretending sick ; refuse go school ; cling parent ; worry parent may die . Older child may sulk , behave inappropriately school , act negative grouchy manner , feel misunderstood . Because normal behavior vary one childhood stage another , difficult determine whether child go temporary `` phase '' suffer depression . This study compare IPT-AST , Enhanced IPT-AST , Usual Care prevention adolescent depression . Participation single-blind study last approximately 21 month . Participants randomly assign receive either IPT-AST , Enhanced IPT-AST , Usual Care 12 week . IPT-AST school-based group intervention program focus prevention , psychoeducation , interpersonal skill-building . Enhanced IPT-AST entail IPT-AST plus three parent-adolescent session . Usual Care consist standard treatment include IPT-AST . Study visit occur intervention baseline Weeks 6 12 . Follow-up visit occur 6 , 12 , 18 month post-intervention . Study visit assessment include depression symptom , anxiety symptom , psychiatric diagnosis , overall functioning , social adjustment , parent-child conflict , perceive support parent peer , service utilization .
